title: E-Commerce Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing online store inventory, orders, and analytics with real-time data visualization.

caseStudy.problem: Client needed a centralized platform to manage inventory across multiple channels with real-time sales tracking.
caseStudy.solution: Built a SPA using React and Recharts for visualization, connected to a Node.js backend. Implemented optimistic UI updates for better UX.
caseStudy.result: Reduced inventory management time by 40% and provided actionable insights through data visualization.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop kanban boards and team real-time updates.

caseStudy.problem: Remote teams struggled with syncing task status in real-time without refreshing pages.
caseStudy.solution: Leveraged Vercel KV and server actions in Next.js for efficient state management and real-time reflection.
caseStudy.result: Improved team coordination and reduced missed deadlines by 25%.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Modern, accessible, and performant personal portfolio website with dark mode and smooth animations.

caseStudy.problem: Needed a unique professional presence to showcase projects and skills effectively.
caseStudy.solution: Designed a minimal yet interactive UI. Used Framer Motion for revealing content and ensuring high accessibility standards.
caseStudy.result: Achieved 100/100 Lighthouse score and received positive feedback on UX/UI design.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Beautiful weather application providing detailed forecasts using external APIs and geolocation.

caseStudy.problem: Users wanted a simple, no-clutter interface to check weather quickly.
caseStudy.solution: Focused on typography and extensive use of icons. Implemented caching to reduce API calls.
caseStudy.result: High user retention and fast load times even on slow networks.
